description: Hands-on missions for chapter 12 using for and while loops, range(), and simple iteration patterns.

solution.notes: Learner should use a for loop with range to print numbers 1 through 10 (inclusive), not by writing ten separate print statements.
Learner should use a for loop over a list of numbers to compute a total sum into a variable and then print it, without using the built-in sum().
Learner should use a while loop with a countdown variable, printing numbers down to 1 and then printing 'Liftoff!'.

practices.title: Mission: Count a Letter in a Word

solution.notes: Learner should loop over the characters in a string, count how many match a target letter, and print how many times it was found.
